title: Ticket #4604: Batch_test does not work with active state perl out of batlab
description:
On a regular pc with cygwin removed, batch_test hangs. But in the batlab with cygwin extracted from path it works...... We don't want folks to have to install cygwin to test on windows.

The issue was that we were using `date` in the testiing perl modules. Without cygwin, this waits for a persona to change the date. These calls were all removed and we run fine on windows now.
creator: bt
